text: Pattukottai Periyappa (Tamil: பட்டுக்கோட்டை பெரியப்பா) is a 1994 Indian Tamil film, directed by Visu and produced by Manivasagam. The film stars Lakshmi, Anand Babu, Mohini and Visu in lead roles. The film had musical score by Deva. ==Cast== *Lakshmi *Anand Babu *Mohini *Visu as Pattukottai Periyappa *Vivek *Y.
